mapper.select: SELECT id, row_number() over(order BY id )as NO, id, users_id, product_id, buy_qty, buy_price, buy_name, created_at FROM buy WHERE users_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into buy( users_id,product_id,buy_qty, buy_price,buy_name, created_at) values(#{id}, #{productId}, #{buyQty}, #{buyPrice},#{buyName},NOW())
